attributes.action: A public Vote of no confidence
attributes.additional_details: We as people/citizens of the uk have no faith in the government
attributes.background: This petition is to put forward the people’s wants in forcing a public vote of no confidence as regards to the government’s poor performance while in office

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or the Government to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
